All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class FRLayoutAnimator<V,E>
extends LayoutAnimator<V,E>

A class for Animating Laoyouts which will Cluster correlated molecules together based on the Fruchterman Reingold algorithm.

Author:
Thomas McGrew
